summary: Web app that shows a 'Yes/No' flow and, after the user presses 'Yes' and/or navigates to a second page, displays a large stylish title message: "NABIHA SHINWARI LOVE YOU".

existing_features.title: Update the post-"Yes" flow so that after the user clicks "Yes! ðŸ’•", the app navigates to a distinct second screen (second page view within the same React app) that prominently displays the title text exactly: "NABIHA SHINWARI LOVE YOU".

Style the title "NABIHA SHINWARI LOVE YOU" in a visually "stylish alphabet" presentation suitable for a big screen (large hero typography, strong contrast, decorative but readable styling), while keeping all other user-facing text in English.

Provide a clear, simple way to proceed from the first post-Yes meme screen to the second title screen (e.g., a "Next"/"Continue" button), without breaking the existing romantic theme and background pattern.

new_feature_requests.summary: Display the message/title "NABIHA SHINWARI LOVE YOU" in a stylish alphabet/font on a big screen after the user presses Yes.
On the same web app, after navigating to the second page, show the title "NABIHA SHINWARI LOVE YOU" (large/hero-style).
Finalize the project/version so it is the finished (final) deliverable.

projectName: Show large stylish title message on second screen after Yes
